thread.title: Business Travel Awards 2016: Final call for entries
thread.title_full: Business Travel Awards 2016: Final call for entries

author: Buying Business Travel
title: Business Travel Awards 2016: Final call for entries
text:
Business Travel Awards 2016: Final call for entries 0 comments Follow @BBT_online 
There is less than a week to go before the final entry deadline for the 2016 Business Travel Awards. 
It couldn't be easier to take part. Simply complete an online Q&A form before the September 14 deadline. 
Click here to view categories & entry criteria. 
NEW for 2016 , the Rising Star of the Year award is a great way to recognise future leaders in our industry. In this category we are looking for individuals who have demonstrated a strong professional work ethic, and shown great potential in their organisation. 
In addition to this, our S pecialist Business Travel Product/Provider award has been reworked and split into two separate categories to reward the Best Specialist Business Travel Service and Best Travel Technology Product. 
Download the awards entry pack for more information on judging criteria and tips for putting together your entry.
